divs: sighting detailsplease see my one-time post on you-tube by searching "rb-47" and picking what is at this time the first reference on that page, 2 entries under the id of larrypok. in the last few months ( this being currently 2\2013 ) i have asked my brother if he remembered the meteror on sumter and he said yes. i told him that was no meteror as we thought. i told him of my post, the story and map disclosed as a ufo, he responded right off the bat with that it was totally silent, and then began to stare for several minutes much like living it all over again in his minds eye those many years ago as we stood in the front yard of sumter that night next to each other ( a street that no longer exists, but is a nearby shopping center now ). i can still see the colors wash across his face, his mouth open, the houses and street lit, my girl cousins faces flashing with colors ( just before they went screaming into the house ). i dont care if anyone ever believes me, it bothers me not. thanks.
